turkish_example_sentence: Sen konferansta güzel bir konuşma söyleyecektin fakat hastalandın.
english_example_sentence: You were going to give a beautiful speech at the conference but you got sick.
russian_example_sentence: Ты собирался произнести красивую речь на конференции, но заболел.
